name: URLTrapper
tagline: Trap opening URL and open selected browser.
body:
### HOW TO USE

1. Open `URLTrapper.app`
2. Click `Set Default Browser`
3. Open URLs from any Application
4. Click `Open Safari` or other `Open` button

![Screenshot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11857/3103712/470fb9fa-e65b-11e3-9e56-3f1b7f01266a.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
